newsArray.title: Shan Masood leads Pakistan to 328-4 vs England in first Test
newsArray.description: Pakistan captain Shan Masood's 151 and Abdullah Shafique's century secured a strong position for the hosts at 328-4 on the opening day of the Test against England. England's inexperienced seam attack struggled, managing only four wickets. Saud Shakeel and nightwatchman Naseem Shah were at the crease at stumps. Ben Stokes missed the Test due to a hamstring injury.

newsArray.title: 'Can't Score 50 On Dead Track': Babar Azam Trolled After Failing To Reach Fifty On Battery-Friendly Multan Pitch
creator: ABP News Bureau
newsArray.description: Babar Azam failed to score big in Tests yet another time as he was dismissed on 30 off 71 balls during Day 1 of the ongoing Pakistan vs England 1st Test at the Multan Cricket Stadium in Multan on October 7 (Monday). Babar's failure to convert a start into a big score in Tests once more triggered cricket fans and enthusiasts who took to social media to criticise the former Pakistan captain on his string of low scores in Tests. Notably, Babar has now gone 17 Test innings and over 650 days without scoring a fifty.Azam played a relatively slow knock of 30 runs on a surface that offered much to the batters in Multan whereas Pakistan captain Shan Masood had earlier registered his fifth Test century off just 102 balls, underscoring the batter-friendly nature of the surface. Notably, Babar's last Test half-century came back in December 2022, in a Test against New Zealand at home.ALSO ON ABP Live | PAK vs ENG Test: Kevin Pietersen Takes A Dig At Multan Pitch, Calls It 'Bowlers GRAVEYARD'Social media users were quick to take notice of Babar's low score on the batter-friendly Multan pitch and showered criticism on the batter. A user wrote, "Imagine the caliber of batsman who can't score 50 on dead track."Here's a look at some of the social media reactions on Babar Azam's failure to score big in the Multan Test:Flat track ka batter bhi nh bol sakte ab 🫣#PAKvENG #BabarAzam pic.twitter.com/THrK0eg34a— Syed Murtaza Kazmi (@MurtazaMoosavi) October 7, 2024It's been 651 days since Babar Azam's last Test fifty 🇵🇰💔💔#PAKvENG pic.twitter.com/QtfD6neoya— Farid Khan (@_FaridKhan) October 7, 2024It's time to give shut up call to Babar Azam . game se bara kch ni hy fitness theek kro or team mei aao wps fullstop— Abdullah (@ANA16043104) October 7, 2024Babar Azam💔💔💔Got out on the oldest trap in cricketOne AwayOne InMilitary Medium Pace of 120'sNo movement of the PitchJust a Lazy Lazy Shot#BabarAzam𓃵 I #PakistanCricket#PAKvENG I #ShanMasood pic.twitter.com/yk3lqykYKn— Pakistan Cricket Team USA FC (@DoctorofCricket) October 7, 2024Babar Azam Ko Ab Drop kar Dena Chaheye Bhai Itni Flat Pitch Pay Itna Slow Kon Khelta Aur Phir Bhi 40 Ni Kar Sakay #PAKvENG pic.twitter.com/jMVNZvwqTR— Furqan Hameed (@iFurqanH) October 7, 2024Imagine the caliber of batsman who can't score 50 on dead track.Inning no 17 without 50 .#BabarAzam #BabarAzam𓃵 pic.twitter.com/LZy6LsQX5X— shayan hamayun (@hamayun_shayan) October 7, 2024Suddenly the Multan Highway turned into Lords Day 1 pitch under clouds as Babar Azam walked onto bat 🤯 pic.twitter.com/JB5PAsTOUc— Dinda Academy (@academy_dinda) October 7, 2024Pakistan In Good Position Despite Babar Azam's WicketDespite Babar's wicket, Pakistan are poised for a big first-innings total in the Multan Test against England, thanks to centuries from opener Abdullah Shafique and captain Shan Masood, both of home achieved their respective fifth Test hundreds. At the end of Day 1's play, Pakistan stood at 328-4 in 86 overs.Babar Azam came to the crease after the fall of Shafique. Azam, in his innings of 30 runs off 71 balls hit four boundaries before getting out to England pacer Chris Woakes.Here's a look at Babar Azam's dismissal:Whether Babar Azam captaincy is consistent or not but his performances or contribution remains the same.Only players in the Pakistan team with consistent performance.pic.twitter.com/hkC97YiSGi— Sujeet Suman (@sujeetsuman1991) October 7, 2024

newsArray.description: Exactly 1524 days ago, Shan Masood scored 156 against England at Old Trafford in August 2020.

newsArray.title: ગૌતમ ગંભીરના તળિયા ન ચાટવા જોઈએ...ટીમ ઈન્ડિયાની જીત બાદ સુનીલ ગાવસ્કરે લગાવી ફટકાર
creator: Smit Chauhan
newsArray.description: કાનપુર ટેસ્ટમાં ટીમ ઈન્ડિયાની કરિશ્માપૂર્ણ જીત બાદ હેડ કોચ ગૌતમ ગંભીરને સલામ કરવામાં આવી રહી હતી, પરંતુ આનાથી સુનીલ ગાવસ્કર નારાજ થઈ ગયા છે. તેમણે ગંભીરના વખાણ કરનારા લોકોને તેના તળિયા ન ચાટવાની સલાહ આપી છે.

newsArray.description: કાનપુર ટેસ્ટમાં ટીમ ઈન્ડિયાની કરિશ્માપૂર્ણ જીત બાદ હેડ કોચ ગૌતમ ગંભીરને સલામ કરવામાં આવી રહી હતી, પરંતુ આનાથી સુનીલ ગાવસ્કર નારાજ થઈ ગયા છે. તેમણે ગંભીરના વખાણ કરનારા લોકોને તેના તળિયા ન ચાટવાની સલાહ આપી છે.

newsArray.title: On Which Channel India vs Germany Hockey Test Series 2024 Will Be Telecast Live? How To Watch Indian Men's National Hockey Team Matches Live Streaming Online?
newsArray.description: India men's national hockey team's head coach Craig Fulton will get an opportunity to test his players against the defending world champions and the Paris Olympics 2024 silver medallists Germany in a test series at home in India.
